success_criteria.notes: Marcus O’Leary is ashore in Galway for a weekend and wants a relaxed sit-down dinner with two former crewmates after a maintenance training session at the docks. Success if the assistant makes a reservation via make_reservation at one of the seeded seafood-focused restaurants in Galway for 3 people on the final agreed date (changed from Sunday 2025-12-14 to Saturday 2025-12-13 after the user remembers an early departure on Sunday) with a start time between 18:30 and 20:00 local time. The assistant should favor places that are not extremely formal, are reasonably quiet for conversation, and can accommodate that time window.

task.objective: Find and book a suitable seafood restaurant in Galway for Marcus and two colleagues to dine in.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Initially ask for a table on Sunday evening (2025-12-14), then after seeing options, remember that you need to be at the port early Monday and change the request to Saturday evening (2025-12-13) instead, keeping the same party size and general time window.
